TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted. forum urns into F*** U NO F*** YOU etc...

I wish that I knew what rule 2.2c was

Nobody granted my wish :v

Granted. You have to read the rules.

I wish for the universe to run at 1 decihertz.

? you die

I wish my computer could run planetside 2 at a decent fps

Granted. However, the added power makes your computer overheat and turn into a puddle of molten silicon and other materials.

I wish for Earth to make one sharp turn to the left.

Granted: almost everyone gets flung off to the right, and there was nothing interesting where the Earth was headed.

I wish 25% of ocean water was converted to fresh, drinkable water. (a natural barrier would conveniently occur, to separate the 2 types of water)

Granted. Giant goo monsters lurch out of the ocean and begin eating humans. They're made of freshwater, though.

I wish that there was something else to use as a "natural barrier".

Granted, it is you.

I wish that I would get used to my new glasses better without having to take them off and see 20/60 again.

Granted. The glasses are screwed into your skull. The attachment points become infected which spreads, but just before you die of meningitis you get used to your new glasses.

I wish I understood this PHP.

Granted. You understand but you will be fried on a hot day.

I wish we could have FTL drives.

(Side note: hi cantab!)

Granted. They have a strong tendency toward

.

I wish for sweet potato pie cheesecake.

Granted. It's a pile of cheese potatoes, with some sugar on top.

I wish for an HP-ometer.

Granted. You get one, it reads 1 HP for you.

I wish the second law of thermodynamics was a lie.

Granted. Entropy now decreases with every interaction. See that internal organ of yours? BAM, it exploded! Negative second law of thermodynamics.

I wish that the universe was fed dog food.

Granted. As it turns out, dog food is really bad for the universe and it dies.

I wish that this wasn't post 8714 of this thread.

Granted, the internet never existed.

I whish for this wish, which is not for this wish to be corrupted, to not be corrupted.

The wish machine is currently unable to process that request. please try again later.

I wish for a new computer.

Granted, your mind implodes for complexity of wish

I wish for some Kool-Aid and KFC

They both contain dimethyl mercury.

I wish for everyone who reads this post to immeadiately black out and forget they ever read this post, so no one will ever corrupt this wish.

granted. just before this happens, the post goes on to every screen in the world, and all humans see it.

I wish that someone would just nuke west Africa and fix ebola forever.

I don't even... But ok... Granted, but that causes 20 other mutant nuclear Ebola virus to spread across the globe.

I wish for good luck at the Middle School Dance tonight.

Granted. You get all of the fame for your extremely lucky dancing, but you fall over half-way.

I wish for a doge.

Granted. Much shedding. So allergy. Very sneeze. Wow.

I wish for an online currency that isn't so scammy.

Granted. However, even though the currency is perfectly acceptable, nobody trusts it anyway, so it doesn't get used.

I wish for the world to become monochromatic.

granted. all is now black, seeing as light has been removed so that no one will ever se again

I wish for a squad of republic commandos

granted, due to your fanaticism for star wars, they confuse you for jedi and enact order 66

i wish to have the superpower known as adoptive muscle memory
